column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The ambience is awesome! Very cool interior
column2: with good music too! Our waiter was great
column4: the fries we ordered were too salty
column6: and the waiter took it off the bill
column7: which we appreciated. They comped our dessert because it was our anniversary
column8: which we also appreciated very much. The food was tasty
column9: but we weren't blown away by it
column10: especially for the price... Â although
column11: the chocolate creme pie is DIVINE!!! Order it
